name: Relation Shift
description:
CONCEPT: The concept of this prototype is to test a gravity shifting mechanic along with other force manipulating mechanics throughout various puzzle levels. 

OBJECTIVES:  This prototype has two types of levels, "Race" and "CO-OP".

RACE - The main objective for each player should be to get to their respective goals before the other, using their abilities to shift gravity to disrupt one another from getting to the other side

CO-OP - Some levels will have both players cooperate to get to the end of the level. If this is the case, both players must find keys to open their respective doors. The level will not be cleared until both players have gotten to their respective doors.

NOTE: If anyone truly likes this prototype's concept, please suggest ideas in the comments. If any bugs are found, please mention those as well, it'd really help with the future development of this game. Enjoy~!
